data.comment: The big names in today's match at Roazhon Park have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Rennes.
In the minute 1, Rennes have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
In the minute 6, Rennes to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
Rennes's Benjamin Bourigeaud gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
In the minute 7, Rennes have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Rennes are pushing forward but Raphinha's finish is wide of the goal.
Reims have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Florent Batta awards Reims a goal kick.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Florent Batta awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Florent Batta signals a Reims throw-in in Rennes's half.
Reims's El Bilal Toure attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rennes.
In Rennes Reims drive forward through Nathanael Mbuku. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Reims.
In the minute 11, Goal! Reims have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Yunis Abdelhamid.
Arber Zeneli instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Rennes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
Throw-in for Rennes in their own half.
In the minute 13, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Reims are caught offside.
Throw-in Reims.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Reims at Roazhon Park.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
In the minute 17, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Reims have a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rennes's Flavien Tait breaks free at Roazhon Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for Reims at Roazhon Park.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Raphinha is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 24, Sehrou Guirassy with an assist there.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Rennes close to the penalty box.
In the minute 29, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
Reims's Arber Zeneli is whistled for offside at Roazhon Park.
Reims's Arber Zeneli is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 32, Rennes have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Throw-in for Rennes in the half of Reims.
Rennes have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 34, Rennes drive upfield and Raphinha gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Reims defender.
Rennes are coming forward and Benjamin Bourigeaud gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rennes.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Damien Da Silva (Rennes) has received a yellow card from Florent Batta.
In the minute 36, Throw-in Rennes.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
Goal! A Damien Da Silva header gives Rennes a 2-1 lead in Rennes.
In the minute 38, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Reims.
Flavien Tait is booked for the home team.
Wout Faes of Reims gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 39, Florent Batta awards Rennes a goal kick.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
Free kick for Rennes in the half of Reims.
In the minute 40, Reims's Wout Faes has been booked in Rennes.
Sehrou Guirassy (Rennes) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Florent Batta awards Reims a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Florent Batta signals a Reims throw-in in Rennes's half.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
Florent Batta awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Free kick Rennes.
Yehvann Diouf is replacing Predrag Rajkovic for Reims at Roazhon Park.
Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Reims's Boulaye Dia misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Reims pushes forward through El Bilal Toure, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 51, Free kick Rennes.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rennes.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Reims in the half of Rennes.
At Roazhon Park, Eduardo Camavinga has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Corner awarded to Reims.
In the minute 55, Ball goes out of play for a Rennes goal kick.
Reims push forward at Roazhon Park and Xavier Chavalerin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Rennes defence.
Marshall Munetsi's header is off-target for Reims.
In the minute 56, Rennes have a goal kick.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Rennes.
Xavier Chavalerin (Reims) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 58, In Rennes Rennes attack through Raphinha. The finish is off target, however.
Florent Batta awards Reims a goal kick.
Can Reims capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rennes's half?
In the minute 59, Throw-in Rennes.
Goal kick for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
Throw-in for Rennes in the half of Reims.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Rennes close to the penalty box.
Can Rennes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, Ball goes out of play for a Rennes goal kick.
Reims have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
In the minute 64, Benjamin Bourigeaud for Rennes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rennes.
Romain Del Castillo is on a sub for Flavien Tait for Rennes.
In the minute 65, The away team have replaced Nathanael Mbuku with Dereck Kutesa. This is the second substitution made today by David Guion.
Mathieu Cafaro is replacing Arber Zeneli for the away team.
Florent Batta awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 66, Boulaye Dia grabs a goal to bring things level at 2-2 at Roazhon Park.
That's a fine assist from Dereck Kutesa.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Rennes just outside Reims's area.
In the minute 69, Raphinha (Rennes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rennes have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 70, Reims to take a throw-in in Rennes territory.
Free kick Rennes.
Marshall Munetsi for Reims has been booked by Florent Batta and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 71, The away team replace El Bilal Toure with Valon Berisha.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sacha Boey for Rennes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rennes.
Ball safe as Rennes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 75, Rennes needs to be cautious. Reims have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Reims.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Rennes make their second substitution with Jonas Martin replacing Eduardo Camavinga.
Important block from the Reims defence as Sacha Boey fires in a strike for Rennes.
In the minute 80, Rennes have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Florent Batta awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Reims at Roazhon Park.
Rennes to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
The away team replace Boulaye Dia with Kaj Sierhuis.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
In the minute 84, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
Rennes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Florent Batta signals a Rennes throw-in in Reims's half.
In the minute 86, Rennes have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Rennes's Damien Da Silva goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Florent Batta awards Rennes a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
Throw-in high up the field for Rennes in Rennes.
Rennes drive upfield at Roazhon Park and Steven Nzonzi hits the bar with a header.
In Rennes Rennes attack through Benjamin Bourigeaud. The finish is off target, however.
Reims have a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Rennes.
Rennes's Sehrou Guirassy gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Reims at Roazhon Park.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Reims.
Throw-in for Rennes in the half of Reims.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Rennes's Nayef Aguerd has been booked in Rennes.
